action.primary: Clears Heat and resolves Fire Toxicity

indications: Upper respiratory tract infection, pneumonia, adenitis

action.primary: Invigorates the Blood, disperses Stagnant Blood, removes tumors and disperses accumulations

indications: Lung, nasopharyngeal, esophageal, Liver and skin carcinomas

contraindications: When used in decoction, it should be cooled for an extended period.

useCases: As a stew in long-term treatment of various fixed masses

notes: The fresh herb can be used topically as a paste or wash to treat Wind-Damp Bi or swollen fingers.
Folk medicine sources say that it is Warm, slightly astringent, expels Wind, disperses Cold, reduces swelling, connects bones and stops cough.
It has recently been used in the treatment of certain cancers, especially metatastic trophoblastic neoplasms in the Lungs, Lung cancer and throat cancer.
